mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_CODE IN (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE UPPER_DEPT_CODE=#{deptCode}) OR DEPT_CODE=#{deptCode})

SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.NAME, A.ID, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE, TO_CHAR(A.BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH, A.DEPT_CODE, A.UPPER_DEPT_CODE, A.JOB_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE, A.RESIGNATION_DATE, A.STATUS, A.ADMIN, A.CREATE_DATE, A.REJECT_REASON, DEPT_NAME, JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON(A.DEPT_CODE=B.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN JOB C ON (A.JOB_CODE=C.JOB_CODE) WHERE STATUS='I' OR STATUS='Q' ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES(EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name} ,#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{dept_code}, #{upper_dept_code}, #{job_code}, TO_DATE(#{join_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NULL, 'I', DEFAULT, NULL, SYSDATE, NULL)
